body.name: Professional Ozone Facial Steamer with Hot Mist Function, Stand Facial Steamer On Wheels, Height Adjustable & 360° Rotatable Nozzle, Use at Home & Salon SPA
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 43 mins
features: ❤️2 In 1 Ozone Facial Steamer❤️: Cleanse your skin with this facial standing steamer. It has a dual action mode that uses ozone negative ions and boiling water to produce ozone-infused steam. The ozone loosens dirt and oil trapped in your pores and increases hydration, leaving your skin feeling soft.

❤️Rejuvenates Skin❤️ : The professional facial steamer promotes blood flow, which helps bring nutrients and oxygen to the skin cells, resulting in healthier, younger looking skin. Ozone Thermal Mist Face Steamer reduces visible wrinkles and dark spots, leaving skin with a smooth and even texture.

❤️Adjustable Height & 360° Rotatable Nozzle❤️: The adjustable height(38"-47.83") and 360° rotating nozzle allows you to complete your facial spa at multiple angles and heights conveniently. Place the sponge in the aromatherapy cartridge at the nozzle, drop in the aromatherapy oil and enjoy your aromatherapy spa.

❤️Suitable for All Kinds of Skin❤️: The 360° steam head of the facial steamer provides complete coverage of the face. Facial steam is suitable for oily and dry skin types. Facial ozone therapy eliminates impurities, opens pores and increases the breathability of the skin.

❤️Multi-Purpose❤️: Professional beauty equipment for beauty salons, hair salons or other professional treatment places. Or you can have one at home. The simple design and easy operation can provide you with professional level treatments at home. Not only will it save your time, but also save your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money
reviews.reviewText: Not worth it at all. Didn’t work consistently and quit working completely before a year rolled around. Customer service when trying to resolve the issue was also awful. Unresponsive the majority of the time, and quite rude when trying to ask questions to see if there is a way to fix it rather than having to find a more complicated solution. Not helpful at all, and not worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bummed it first but now I'm very happy with my purchase!!!
reviews.reviewText: okay so I was a little bit nervous ordering this product because some of the bad reviews were all saying the same thing. when I got my machine it did do the same thing those review said so I was super upset. I put in a request for a return and they sent me a message on things to try before I tried to return it. I really love the look of the machine and obviously the price point is awesome so I really wanted this to work! I tried it exactly what they said and now it works perfectly! I guess when you get the machine sometimes it beeps non-stop while it's because when you put the distilled water in its not detecting the water because the water so pure it needs to be able to detect the electrolytes in the water so when you first get it you need to put tap water with a little bit of salt in it, not every time but for the first few times since it's new. After I did that my machine works beautifully! the design is awesome and it's quiet I definitely recommend this machine especially at its price point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars don’t get it
reviews.reviewText: i had it for 6 weeks and it’s already broke. i didn’t even use it that much unfortunately. window to return closed. it must have had a short because it started shutting off automatically and then never turned on again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. Heats up water faster then any other steamer I’ve used.
reviews.reviewText: I had one of these steamers and it stopped working. But the company sent me a new one and it works great. Thank you for the great customer service. It’s simple. Easy to use. Reliable. And it heats up the water super fast which I love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this in an emergency since my 2 year old professional facial steamer broke. I like it so well I may just wait on purchasing another. I like the water container,the steam flow is nice, its quiet,and has an adjustable arm. So far I am pleasantly surprised especially at this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works great. I highly suggest it. Great salon quality on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product just wish it extended a little higher for my taller clients

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Caught on fire while off!
reviews.reviewText: The product wasn't very sturdy to start with, the base is wobbly. Also didn't like that it doesn't steam most of the water out. I get a max of 9 mins. Lastly, the machine was plugged in but the power was off and all of a sudden I smelled burning and saw smoke coming from the unit. The heating element turned very bright red and flames sparked. I'm so glad this happened while I was at my business or else there would have been a terrible fire. Do not buy!

The quality is very cheap, please value your money and don’t waste on this. This item is unacceptable. Poorly packaged and all metal parts are dented and one important screw is missing, without this your are not able to assemble and it means you have useless steamer.
